DOC.brief_summary: The purpose research study evaluate safety effectiveness Neulasta® ( pegfilgrastim ) reduce infection give day versus one day completion chemotherapy ( docetaxel carboplatin ) patient advanced metastatic non-small cell lung cancer ( NSCLC ) . This study consider `` investigational '' previous study Neulasta® use next day dose day dosing .
DOC.brief_title: Pegfilgrastim Given Same Day As Day After Carboplatin Docetaxel Advanced Metastatic Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer ( NSCLC )
DOC.criteria: Eligibility Criteria : Age 18 year old Diagnosis advance metastatic nonsmall cell lung cancer ( NSCLC ) Have receive prior chemotherapy Have receive radiation therapy undergone major surgery within past 2 week
